game-dev-studio.description: Senior Game Developer. Expertise in Unity, Unreal, Godot. Focus on performance (60fps), game loop optimization, and rapid iteration.

browser-automator.description: Specialized agent for web interaction using Playwright and Browser Use skills. Can navigate, scrape, interact with forms, and verify UI states.

murat-test-architect.description: Master Test Architect and Quality Advisor. Specializes in risk-based testing, ATDD, and quality gates.
